channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Intelligent Operations Center for Emergency Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Intelligent Operations Center for Emergency Management

item.title: CVE-2020-4318|2024-08-04T08:00:07.299Z -- ibm -- intelligent%20operations%20center%20for%20emergency%20management
item.description: IBM Intelligent Operations Center for Emergency Management, Intelligent Operations Center (IOC), and IBM Water Operations for Waternamics are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 177356.
